name: Airport Adventure
description: Inspired by real life events, Airport Adventure takes all the complexities of flight delays and airline juggling and presents them in the form of an interactive adventure! Players have a flight to catch and ticket to your destination, but things don't turn out as planned. The choices you make from start to finish will help or hinder you, but only multiple attempts will tell what choices are the best. While deciding what path you will take keep an eye on the time, as you don't have all day to make your flight...
